product_name: Big Agnes Memory Foam Pad Kit - Long Wide - 2007 Closeout
long_description: Are you still feeling those rocks and twigs through your sleeping pad? Don't get a new pad--just add this memory-foam pad cover to your existing pad and say goodnight to those annoying pokes.
short_description: Are you still feeling those rocks and twigs through your sleeping pad? Don't get a new pad--just add this memory-foam pad cover to your existing pad and say goodnight to those annoying pokes.
